title: I believe that my phone is locked by verizon, how do i unlock it? Is it possible through google?
content:
I have bought it unlocked from amazon supposedly.
but it seems it isn't.
I asked verizon for help but they said i should ask amazon about how to fix it...
I have asked Amazon for support and they said that Google should solve such issues?

 My phone cant use sim cards and States "SIM CARD ISN'T SUPPORTED: ask verizon if this device can be unlocked"
